data.actual_result: Discord voice chat will mute the external source and just keep the voice channel live.
data.expected_result: Discord should "pause" or quit the voice channel. (Ex: Pandora would stop playing music if I switched over to Youtube).
data.short_description: Voice channels don't pause for external sources of media. (Youtube, Pandora, etc)(Maybe a feature?)
data.steps_to_repro: - Join an active voice channel. - Hit the home button, and try to play Youtube, or Pandora, or some other source.
